pr_title: Fix StaticArrayEntryTest.testToStringWithNoValue hex long leading zero flaky test

timeline.bodyText: Shall we use a less "magical" number here, e.g. Long.MAX_VALUE >> 3 (which has 15 "F"s in hex format)?
timeline.author: li-boxuan

replies.bodyText: I got this value from one of the failing tests but you are right, Long.MAX_VALUE >> 3 is less confusing. Changed that to Long.MAX_VALUE >> 3
replies.author: porunov

timeline.message:
Fix StaticArrayEntryTest.testToStringWithNoValue hex long leading zero flaky test

Fixes #2248

Signed-off-by: Oleksandr Porunov <alexandr.porunov@gmail.com>
